product.title: Product
product.name: Product Name
product.allProductsDesc: Explore our carefully designed high-quality clothing collection
product.newArrivalsDesc: Discover the latest styles and designs

sizeGuide.title: Size Guide
sizeGuide.subtitle: Choose the right size for the perfect fit. All measurements are in centimeters (cm).
sizeGuide.chestMeasureDesc: Wrap the tape measure horizontally around the fullest part of your chest, keeping it level and close to your body.
sizeGuide.waistMeasureDesc: Measure horizontally around the narrowest part of your waist, usually about 2-3 cm above your navel.
sizeGuide.hipMeasureDesc: Measure horizontally around the fullest part of your hips, keeping the tape level.
sizeGuide.shoulderMeasureDesc: Measure the straight distance from one shoulder point to the other.
sizeGuide.betweenSizes: If your measurements fall between two sizes:
sizeGuide.loosefit: For a loose, comfortable fit, choose the larger size
sizeGuide.slimfit: For a slim, fitted look, choose the smaller size
sizeGuide.note1: Different styles may have 1-2cm variations, which is normal
sizeGuide.note2: Please refer to the specific size information on the product detail page
sizeGuide.note3: If you have any questions, please contact customer service for professional advice

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.subtitle: We offer multiple shipping options to ensure your items arrive safely and quickly.
shipping.domesticDesc: We cover all provinces and cities nationwide, including remote areas. Some remote areas may require an additional 1-2 days.
shipping.internationalDesc: We support delivery to over 200 countries and regions worldwide.
shipping.step1Desc: After successful payment, the system automatically confirms your order.
shipping.step2Desc: We will complete packaging within 24 hours.
shipping.step3Desc: Once shipped, you'll receive an email with the tracking number.
shipping.step4Desc: You can track your package location in real-time using the tracking number.
shipping.step5Desc: Please confirm receipt promptly upon receiving your items.
shipping.freeShippingDesc: Free domestic standard shipping on orders over $50
shipping.internationalCostDesc: Calculated based on destination and weight, starting from $15.99
shipping.trackingDesc: After shipping, you'll receive an email with the tracking number. You can:
shipping.trackingMethod1: Log in to your account and view shipping information on the "My Orders" page
shipping.trackingMethod2: Use the tracking number to check on the courier company's website
shipping.trackingMethod3: Contact customer service for the latest shipping status
shipping.note1: Please ensure your shipping address is accurate; incorrect addresses may cause delivery delays
shipping.note2: Please inspect the package before signing; refuse delivery and contact customer service if damaged
shipping.note3: Delivery times may be extended during holidays
shipping.note4: If you have any shipping issues, please contact customer service promptly

returns.title: Return Policy
returns.subtitle: We are committed to providing you with a satisfying shopping experience, supporting 7-day no-reason returns and exchanges.
returns.policyDesc: Within 7 days of receiving your items, if you're not satisfied, you can apply for a return or exchange. We promise to process your request quickly for a worry-free shopping experience.
returns.condition1: Items unused, unwashed, with tags intact
returns.condition2: Apply for return within 7 days of receiving items
returns.condition3: Keep complete product packaging and accessories
returns.condition4: Provide valid order number and purchase proof
returns.step1Desc: Log in to your account, click "Apply for Return" on the order details page, and fill in the reason.
returns.step2Desc: We will review your application within 24 hours and notify you of the result via email.
returns.step3Desc: After approval, please send the items to the specified address. We recommend using a trackable courier service.
returns.step4Desc: Upon receiving the return, we will conduct a quality check to confirm the items meet return conditions.
returns.step5Desc: After passing inspection, we will process the refund to your original payment account within 3-5 business days.
returns.nonReturnable4: Intimate apparel such as underwear and swimwear
returns.nonReturnable5: Items with removed tags or damaged packaging
returns.qualityIssueDesc: For returns due to quality issues, we cover round-trip shipping costs. Please contact customer service for the return address and shipping reimbursement.
returns.nonQualityIssueDesc: For returns due to personal reasons (such as wrong size or preference), the buyer covers return shipping, and we cover exchange shipping.
returns.note1: Refunds will be returned to your original payment account; arrival time depends on the payment channel
returns.note2: Exchange items will be shipped within 3 business days after receiving and inspecting the return
returns.note3: Return policies during special promotions may vary; refer to the promotion page for details
returns.note4: If you have any questions, please contact customer service anytime; we're here to help

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Here are the most frequently asked questions to help you find answers quickly.
faq.q1: How do I place an order?
faq.a1: Browse the product pages, select items you like, click "Add to Cart", then proceed to checkout, fill in your shipping address and payment information to complete your order.
faq.q2: Can I modify my order after placing it?
faq.a2: After submitting your order, if it hasn't shipped yet, you can contact customer service to request modifications. Once shipped, modifications aren't possible, but you can apply for a return after receiving the items.
faq.q3: How do I cancel an order?
faq.a3: If your order hasn't shipped yet, you can click "Cancel Order" on the "My Orders" page. If it has shipped, you'll need to wait for delivery and then apply for a return.
faq.a4: Yes. Please note your invoice requirements in the order remarks, including the invoice header and tax ID. We'll send the invoice with your items.
faq.a5: We offer Standard Shipping (5-7 business days), Express Shipping (2-3 business days), and International Shipping (10-15 business days).
faq.a6: After successful payment, we'll arrange shipping within 24 hours. You'll receive a shipping notification email with the tracking number.
faq.q7: How do I track my shipment?
faq.a7: Log in to your account, click on order details on the "My Orders" page to view real-time shipping information.
faq.q8: Can I change my shipping address?
faq.a8: Before your order ships, you can contact customer service to modify the shipping address. After shipping, the address cannot be changed.
faq.q9: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a9: We accept cryptocurrency payments (Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.), Alipay, WeChat Pay, credit cards, and other payment methods.
faq.a10: We use industry-leading encryption technology to protect your payment information. All transactions are securely encrypted, so you can pay with confidence.
faq.a11: If payment fails, please check if your account balance is sufficient or try a different payment method. If issues persist, please contact customer service for assistance.
faq.a12: Payment is processed immediately when you place your order. If the order is canceled or returned, the refund will be processed to your original payment account within 3-5 business days.
faq.q13: Do you accept returns and exchanges?
faq.a13: Yes. We offer a 7-day no-reason return and exchange service. Items must be unused with tags intact.
faq.q14: How do I apply for a return or exchange?
faq.a14: Log in to your account, click "Apply for Return" on the order details page, fill in the reason, and submit your application for review.
faq.q15: How long does a refund take?
faq.a15: After receiving and inspecting the return, we'll process the refund within 3-5 business days. Arrival time depends on the payment channel, typically 1-7 business days.
faq.a16: For quality issues, we cover round-trip shipping. For non-quality issues, the buyer covers return shipping, and we cover exchange shipping.
faq.a17: All our products are authentic and can be verified at authorized retailers. If counterfeit items are found, we promise a tenfold compensation.
faq.q18: How do I choose the right size?
faq.a18: Each product page has a detailed size chart. You can also check the "Size Guide" page to learn how to measure. If you have questions, feel free to consult customer service.
faq.a19: We strive to ensure product images match the actual items, but slight color variations may occur due to lighting and display differences. Actual items prevail.
faq.q20: Do products come with a warranty?
faq.a20: All products come with the national three-guarantee service. If you discover quality issues after receiving your items, please contact customer service within 7 days.
faq.noAnswer: Didn't find what you're looking for?
faq.contactUs: Our customer service team is always here to help. Contact us through:

home.heroDescription: Explore our carefully designed high-quality white-label clothing collection, bringing you the perfect combination of comfort and fashion.
home.globalShippingDesc: Covering 50+ countries, fast and secure delivery
home.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know about new releases, limited-time discounts, and exclusive offers.
home.subscribeDisclaimer: By subscribing, you agree to receive our marketing emails. You can unsubscribe at any time.
home.subscribeSuccessDesc: Thank you for subscribing. We'll send you the latest offers.

footer.brandDescription: Focused on high-quality white-label clothing, providing fashionable, comfortable, and cost-effective clothing choices for global consumers.
footer.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to get the latest offers and new product information
